function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential exposure to COVID-19 due to inadequate indoor air quality and thermal comfort in healthcare facilities.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and infection among staff and patients.","Mitigation":"Improving building automation and control systems to enhance indoor air quality and thermal comfort.","Technologies":"Advanced sensors, air purification systems, smart HVAC systems.","People":"Staff, patients, visitors.","Owner":"Healthcare facility management."},{"Description":"Lack of proper auditing and evaluation of building automation and control systems.","Impact":"Inefficient operation, potential for malfunction, and inability to meet indoor air quality and thermal comfort requirements.","Mitigation":"Conducting thorough audits using IBACSA instrument and implementing improvement packages.","Technologies":"IBACSA instrument, automated auditing tools, building management systems.","People":"Building management and technical staff.","Owner":"Research project team, building management staff."},{"Description":"Inadequate economic and technical impacts assessment of BACS improvement packages.","Impact":"Waste of resources, ineffective solutions, and failure to address indoor air quality and thermal comfort needs.","Mitigation":"Thoroughly evaluate and report technical and economic impacts of improvement packages.","Technologies":"Cost-benefit analysis tools, simulation software.","People":"Research project team, healthcare facility management.","Owner":"Research project team, healthcare facility management."}]}
